description:
10/16/2022 – at around 3:36 p.m. near the intersection of SE 10th Avenue and SE Walnut Street. 
Weather was clear and the pavement surface was dry  
This crash involved a vehicle versus a pedestrian with minor injuries.  
The vehicle was travelling northbound on SE 10th in the turn lane to turn left onto SE Walnut when a 
pedestrian stepped out into traffic. Vehicle was unable to stop in time to avoid impact.  
 
 Pedestrian was observed crossing  SE 10th travelling west to east about 150 ft south of crosswalk.  
Witness stated vehicle was travelling slowly , and pedestrian was observed looking northbound 
watching for southbound traffic and did not see impact coming.  
 
Pedestrian admitted fault and alcohol  consumption which may have contributed to crash.  
 No citations were issued.

10/17/2022 – at the intersect ion of NE Cornelius Pass Road and NE Nicholas Court.
 This crash is still under investigation and full details have yet to be released.  
 This crash was  a motorcycle versus vehicle  crash where fatal injuries  were  reported . 
 The vehicle was turning left onto NE Nicholas Court from southbound Cornelius Pass when it was struck by a motorcycle.  
 Witnesses stated that the motorcycle was observed slaloming through the traffic lanes and was travelling well above the pos ted speed limit . The motorcyclist struck the passenger side of the turning 
vehicle as it was almost out of the number 2 lane for northbound Cornelius Pass Road.

10/31/2022  – near the intersection of S 1st Ave and SW Oak Street.  
 
This crash is still under investigation and full details have yet to be released.  
 This crash was a vehicle versus pedestrian crash where fatal injuries were reported.  
 A pedestrian was walking their bike mid -block between cars which were stopped at the red light at S 1st 
and SE Oak. The pedestrian was crossing from south to north. As they  cleared the 2nd and 3rd lanes, 
they got on their bike to ride through the number 1 lane where they were struck.
